title: Anna Bida
content: The implementation of Valocracy in Ipê.city enables the recognition and valuation of contributions in a fair, transparent, and distributed way, without relying on traditional hierarchical structures. By using rarities and calculating the weight of activities based on effort and impact, Valocracy promotes autonomy with accountability, fosters social and economic innovation, and strengthens collaborative ecosystems — all essential for the development of a regenerative, values-driven pop-up city. https://valocracy.xyz/en/read-the-manifesto The implementation of Valocracy addresses a core challenge in emerging and collaborative communities: the difficulty of fairly recognizing, measuring, and valuing different types of contributions — especially those that are subjective, non-monetary, or invisible in traditional models. Without this recognition, conflicts, demotivation, and informal power concentrations tend to arise. Valocracy offers an alternative that brings clarity, reduces disputes over recognition, and strengthens the sense of belonging and shared responsibility among members.Systemic vision, Ability to translate complex concepts into practical tools, Relational sensitivity, Organizational innovation, Commitment to justice and regeneration, and Skill in human coordination.

title: SPACE BETWEEN THINGS
content: Aqui existe minha ideia entre todas as outras, entre tudo, e sei que quando ela econtrar com as outras potencialmente em consciência, uma só se tornará. É aqui que crio essa força particular e reforçada, em dizer que em cada outra perspectiva que aqui se encontrar, levará uma parte da minha versão temporal e representação do que somos como todo, e juntos a esses sigilos reforçados em projetos, com propósitos em comum eu me apresento e proponho ao mundo, mas primeiramente e especialmente ao mundo IPÊMINDTREE a experienciar essa força que todos temos como coletivo e por sermos por exência apenas um.
